languages.text: "Если столь {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}многоопытный Лорд-капитан{/d}, как вы, {mf|счел|сочла} корабль непригодным, значит, иного выхода нет. Хотя бы его останки обеспечат вашему флагману ремонтный материал на долгое время".

"If a Lord Captain as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experienced{/d} as you has deemed the ship unfit for service, then there is simply no other alternative. May the vessel's remains provide your flagship with enough repair materials for many journeys to come."
languages.original_text: "Если столь {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}многоопытный Лорд-капитан{/d}, как вы, {mf|счел|сочла} корабль непригодным, значит, иного выхода нет. Хотя бы его останки обеспечат вашему флагману ремонтный материал на долгое время".

traits.locale_text: "If a Lord Captain as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experienced{/d} as you has deemed the ship unfit for service, then there is simply no other alternative. May the vessel's remains provide your flagship with enough repair materials for many journeys to come."

"If a Lord Captain as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experienced{/d} as you has deemed the ship unfit for service, then there is simply no other alternative. May the vessel's remains provide your flagship with enough repair materials for many journeys to come."

languages.text: “既然像您这么{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}经验丰富{/d}的舰长都认为这艘船不适合服役，那恐怕我们也别无选择。希望这艘船拆解之后，能为您的旗舰提供足够的修理材料，供未来的旅途使用。”
languages.original_text: "If a Lord Captain as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experienced{/d} as you has deemed the ship unfit for service, then there is simply no other alternative. May the vessel's remains provide your flagship with enough repair materials for many journeys to come."

traits.locale_text: “既然像您这么{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}经验丰富{/d}的舰长都认为这艘船不适合服役，那恐怕我们也别无选择。希望这艘船拆解之后，能为您的旗舰提供足够的修理材料，供未来的旅途使用。”

languages.text: 「もしあなたのように{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}経験豊富な{/d}ロード・キャプテンがその船を運用不可能と判断されたのであれば、他に選択肢はありません。船の残骸が、あなたの旗艦にこれからの航海のための十分な修理資材をもたらしますように」
languages.original_text: "If a Lord Captain as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experienced{/d} as you has deemed the ship unfit for service, then there is simply no other alternative. May the vessel's remains provide your flagship with enough repair materials for many journeys to come."

traits.locale_text: 「もしあなたのように{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}経験豊富な{/d}ロード・キャプテンがその船を運用不可能と判断されたのであれば、他に選択肢はありません。船の残骸が、あなたの旗艦にこれからの航海のための十分な修理資材をもたらしますように」

languages.text: «Si un{mf||a} Lord Capitán con tanta {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experiencia{/d} como usted considera que la nave no es apta para el servicio, no tenemos otra alternativa. Espero que sus restos proporcionen suficiente material de reparación para su nave insignia para muchos viajes».
languages.original_text: "If a Lord Captain as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experienced{/d} as you has deemed the ship unfit for service, then there is simply no other alternative. May the vessel's remains provide your flagship with enough repair materials for many journeys to come."

traits.locale_text: «Si un{mf||a} Lord Capitán con tanta {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experiencia{/d} como usted considera que la nave no es apta para el servicio, no tenemos otra alternativa. Espero que sus restos proporcionen suficiente material de reparación para su nave insignia para muchos viajes».

languages.text: "Wenn ein so {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}erfahrener{/d} Lord Captain wie Ihr das Schiff für dienstunfähig hält, gibt es schlichtweg keine Alternative. Ich hoffe, Ihr erhaltet genügend Material zur Reparatur Eures Flaggschiffs, dass es für viele künftige Reisen reicht."
languages.original_text: "If a Lord Captain as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experienced{/d} as you has deemed the ship unfit for service, then there is simply no other alternative. May the vessel's remains provide your flagship with enough repair materials for many journeys to come."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ein so {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}erfahrener{/d} Lord Captain wie Ihr das Schiff für dienstunfähig hält, gibt es schlichtweg keine Alternative. Ich hoffe, Ihr erhaltet genügend Material zur Reparatur Eures Flaggschiffs, dass es für viele künftige Reisen reicht."

languages.text: "Sizin gibi {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}deneyimli{/d} bir Lord Kaptan geminin kullanıma uygun olmadığını düşünüyorsa olay bitmiştir. Dilerim ki geminin kalıntılarından, sancak geminiz için gelecek yolculuklara yetecek kadar onarım materyali çıkar."
languages.original_text: "If a Lord Captain as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experienced{/d} as you has deemed the ship unfit for service, then there is simply no other alternative. May the vessel's remains provide your flagship with enough repair materials for many journeys to come."

traits.locale_text: "Sizin gibi {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}deneyimli{/d} bir Lord Kaptan, geminin kullanıma uygun olmadığını düşünüyorsa olay bitmiştir. Dilerim ki geminin kalıntılarından, sancak geminiz için gelecek yolculuklara yetecek kadar onarım materyali çıkar."

languages.text: « Si {mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}{mf|chevronné|chevronnée}{/d} comme vous estime que le vaisseau est inutilisable, alors, soit. J'espère que les matériaux récupérés vous serviront lors de vos prochains voyages. »
languages.original_text: "If a Lord Captain as {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}experienced{/d} as you has deemed the ship unfit for service, then there is simply no other alternative. May the vessel's remains provide your flagship with enough repair materials for many journeys to come."

traits.locale_text: « Si {mf|un seigneur-capitaine|une seigneure-capitaine} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}{mf|chevronné|chevronnée}{/d} comme vous estime que le vaisseau est inutilisable, alors, soit. J'espère que les matériaux récupérés vous serviront lors de vos prochains voyages. »
